response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for high-quality solutions in its category. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I estimate its worth to be well above $100. Considering its market value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value it offers to users like yourself. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear your positive response soon.", "product_price": 150}
